channel.title: Help ipmute
channel.description: omg iv tried so much stuff i cant even rember but like i can not make ip mute command i tried alot of deferent stuff but after i compiled and ran server id do it but nothing would happen im so confused right now can anyone help me make an ipmute command where they are like muted on every account.

item.title: Help ipmute
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

This code should work;

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“ipmute”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2");
		p.muted = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been ip muted by " + playerName);
		sM("You have ip muted "+p.playerName+"");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip mute..");
            }[/code]

Read full topic
